quote: What I learned from architectural drafting is that everything has to have a plan to work. You just can't wing it. I can't get all the materials I need for a house and just start building. Whether it's a career, family, life - you have to plan it out.
author: Ice Cube

quote: When a work lifts your spirits and inspires bold and noble thoughts in you, do not look for any other standard to judge by: the work is good, the product of a master craftsman.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Ya gots to work with what you gots to work with.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: Listen, I've been pretty fortunate. And if I've been underrated, it's actually been something I've been able to work with; I can surprise people. It sets me up to exceed expectations, so I don't mind.
author: Brad Pitt

quote: O man you are busy working for the world, and the world is busy trying to turn you out.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: I believe in myself and my art so much. I've always trusted destiny. Wherever it takes me, I just work damn hard at the opportunity.
author: Priyanka Chopra

quote: We came to Portland because there was a good alternative public school. Friends who lived there told me about it, and my son loved it. I left his dad and went to work slinging hash in a breakfast diner and working nights tending bar in a biker tavern.
author: Katherine Dunn

quote: For me, Islam is a moral reference point, a source of inspiration to work collectively with people, to love people and to help them, to concentrate on universal values of mercy, co-operation and tolerance.
author: Wadah Khanfar

quote: A manager is responsible for the application and performance of knowledge.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: The biggest job we have is to teach a newly hired employee how to fail intelligently. We have to train him to experiment over and over and to keep on trying and failing until he learns what will work.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Give yourself something to work toward - constantly.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: I grew up upper-class. Private school. My dad had a Jaguar. We're African-American, and we work together as a family, so people assume we're like the Jacksons. But I didn't have parents using me to get out of a bad situation.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: Being an astronaut is a wonderful career. I feel very privileged. But what I really hope for young people is that they find a career they're passionate about, something that's challenging and worthwhile.
author: Ellen Ochoa

quote: Honest labor bears a lovely face.
author: Thomas Dekker

quote: For me, not owning a car means I may spend a little extra time on public transportation, but I can use that time to read, catch up on work projects, and make the phone calls I couldn't get to earlier. Plus, I never waste time at the mechanics or gas station.
author: Lynn Jurich

quote: Nothing is work unless you'd rather be doing something else.
author: George Halas

quote: I'd like to dial it back 5% or 10% and try to have a vacation that's not just e-mail with a view.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Managers in all too many American companies do not achieve the desired results because nobody makes them do it.
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: As I understand it, sport is hard work for which you do not get paid.
author: Irvin S. Cobb

quote: Work is accomplished by those employees who have not yet reached their level of incompetence.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: I think about my work every minute of the day.
author: Jeff Koons

quote: Work will win when wishy washy wishing won t.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: If you're not willing to work, you're never going to be able to experience the American Dream.
author: Jim Jordan

quote: Confidence comes from hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: Anybody who has been seriously engaged in scientific work of any kind realizes that over the entrance to the gates of the temple of science are written the words: 'Ye must have faith.'
author: Max Planck

quote: Philanthropy and social change work are at their best when they are driven by your values and connected to what you care about most.
author: Charles Bronfman

quote: Like all technology, social media is neutral but is best put to work in the service of building a better world.
author: Simon Mainwaring

quote: We are weighed down, every moment, by the conception and the sensation of Time. And there are but two means of escaping and forgetting this nightmare: pleasure and work. Pleasure consumes us. Work strengthens us. Let us choose.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: If efforts to do social work are couched in selfish motives, then they will die a premature death. Why would my efforts get politicised? I have values I inherited from my father. He helped many. Anyone, even a postman knocking on our door would get a glass of water and some sweets.
author: Sachin Tendulkar

quote: I see my upbringing as a great success story. By disciplining me, my parents inculcated self-discipline. And by restricting my choices as a child, they gave me so many choices in my life as an adult. Because of what they did then, I get to do the work I love now.
author: Amy Chua

quote: Archimedes was my ideal. I admired the works of artists, but to my mind, they were only shadows and semblances. The inventor, I thought, gives to the world creations which are palpable, which live and work.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: I have a really beautiful life right now, so there is no reason to be hostile. I'm a husband, a father and a man who tries to do the right thing in life and in my work.
author: Ice Cube

quote: Our work is never over.
author: Kanye West

quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
author: George Burns

quote: We must fight terrorism as if there's no peace process and work to achieve peace as if there's no terror.
author: Yitzhak Rabin

quote: When we go out there, we have fun, but we get to work, and I think we're at our best when we're having fun. Having fun is key.
author: Ezekiel Elliott

quote: The work that we do during the winter is very important; we have a new bike and it's important to develop it during this time, and we start with this test.
author: Valentino Rossi

quote: Gut feeling is all about the experiences that you have had in your life. It is about being in difficult scenarios, knowing what worked, what did not work, and then taking a decision.
author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quote: Live like you'll die tomorrow, work like you don't need the money, and dance like nobody's watching.
author: Bob Fosse

quote: Teachers do the noble work of educating our children. And we can't thank them enough for the hard work they put in every day to ensure a bright future for all of us.
author: Denise Juneau

quote: I've found that the people who play villains are the nicest people in the world, and people who play heroes are jerks. It's like people who play villains work out all their problems on screen, and then they're just really wonderful people.
author: Tim Burton

quote: If you made all the French fries you ate, you would eat them much less often, if only because they're so much work. The same holds true for fried chicken, chips, cakes, pies, and ice cream. Enjoy these treats as often as you're willing to prepare them - chances are good it won't be every day.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: We work in the dark - we do what we can - we give what we have. Our doubt is our passion and our passion is our task. The rest is the madness of art.
author: Henry James

quote: To remain a credible leader, I must always work first, hardest, and longest on changing myself. This is neither easy nor natural, but it is essential.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Problems are only opportunities in work clothes.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

quote: Curves are the essence of my work because they are the essence of Brazil, pure and simple.
author: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: My experience has been that work is almost the best way to pull oneself out of the depths.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
author: John Dewey

quote: The paradigm of the 'Aquarian Conspiracy' sees humankind embedded in nature. It promotes the autonomous individual in a decentralized society... The new perspective respects the ecology of everything: birth, death, learning, health, family, work, science, spirituality, the arts, the community, relationships, politics.
author: Marilyn Ferguson

quote: Empowerment of individuals is a key part of what makes open source work, since in the end, innovations tend to come from small groups, not from large, structured efforts.
author: Tim O'Reilly

quote: Productivity - the amount of output delivered per hour of work in the economy - is often viewed as the engine of progress in modern capitalist economies. Output is everything. Time is money. The quest for increased productivity occupies reams of academic literature and haunts the waking hours of C.E.O.s and finance ministers.
author: Tim Jackson

quote: Work is a necessary evil to be avoided.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Men of lofty genius when they are doing the least work are most active.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Every work of art is the child of its age and, in many cases, the mother of our emotions. It follows that each period of culture produces an art of its own which can never be repeated.
author: Wassily Kandinsky

quote: We dream of having a clean house - but who dreams of actually doing the cleaning? We don't have to dream about doing the work, because doing the work is always within our grasp; the dream, in this sense, is to attain the goal without the work.
author: Marcus Buckingham

quote: Given one well-trained physician of the highest type he will do better work for a thousand people than ten specialists.
author: William J. Mayo

quote: Play is the work of children. It's very serious stuff.
author: Bob Keeshan

quote: Hard work always wins in the end.
author: Lucas Till

quote: Nobody ever drowned in his own sweat.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Unlike a lot of people, I don't feel powerless. I know I can do something. But anyone can do something, it's not about being special. It's about deciding to do it - to dive into work for peace and justice and care for everybody on the planet.
author: Patch Adams

quote: We have a vision of South Africa in which black and white shall live and work together as equals in conditions of peace and prosperity.
author: Oliver Tambo

quote: While having friends shouldn't be the main reason why you love your job, it definitely makes the work day run a lot more smoothly when you have a workplace buddy.
author: John Rampton

quote: Photography is the simplest thing in the world, but it is incredibly complicated to make it really work.
author: Martin Parr

quote: I did my work slowly, drop by drop. I tore it out of me by pieces.
author: Maurice Ravel

quote: Gentleness doesn't get work done unless you happen to be a hen laying eggs.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: We work to become, not to acquire.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I've discovered that Motown and Broadway have a lot in common - a family of wonderfully talented, passionate, hardworking young people, fiercely competitive but also full of love and appreciation for the work, for each other and for the people in the audience.
author: Berry Gordy

quote: I love cooking. There is nothing I like better than going home and cooking my family a nice meal. Anything with pasta! Pasta with butter! I have a good repertoire, and I can do quite a few different dishes. Sometimes they work out and sometimes not.
author: Eden Hazard

quote: I used to go around looking as frumpy as possible because it was inconceivable you could be attractive as well as be smart. It wasn't until I started being myself, the way I like to turn out to meet people that I started to get any work.
author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quote: When a nation has just emerged from the throes of a great civil warfare, where section was arrayed against section, class against class, two things are to be done: First, the work of reconstruction is to be effected; Secondly, a willingness for the proper acceptance of the issue's decision is to be created.
author: Lucius Quintus Cincinnatus Lamar II

quote: To finish a work? To finish a picture? What nonsense! To finish it means to be through with it, to kill it, to rid it of its soul, to give it its final blow the coup de grace for the painter as well as for the picture.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work.
author: Horace

quote: I use Mac. Not because it's more secure than everything else - because it is actually less secure than Windows - but I use it because it is still under the radar. People who write malicious code want the greatest return on their investment, so they target Windows systems. I still work with Windows in virtual machines.
author: Kevin Mitnick

quote: My mother's dad dropped out of the eighth grade to work. He had to. By the time he was 30, he was a master electrician, plumber, carpenter, mason, mechanic. That guy was, to me, a magician. Anything that was broken, he could fix. Anybody anywhere in our community knew that if there was a problem, Carl was there to fix it.
author: Mike Rowe

quote: One thing I never want to be accused of is not working.
author: Don Shula

quote: Making art, good art, is always a struggle. It can make you happy when you pull it off. There's no better feeling. It's beauteous. But it's always about hard work and inspiration and sweat and good ideas.
author: Damien Hirst

quote: To live well is to work well, to show a good activity.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Creative people don't behave very well generally. If you're looking for examples of good relationships in show business, you're gonna be depressed real fast. I don't have time for anything else right now but work and my daughter. She's my first priority.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: As I prepare for my second term as Secretary-General, I am thinking hard about how we can meet the expectations of the millions of people who see the U.N.'s blue flag as a banner of hope. We have to continue our life-saving work in peacekeeping, human rights, development and humanitarian relief.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: When a man tells you that he got rich through hard work, ask him: 'Whose?'
author: Don Marquis

quote: Work expands so as to fill the time available for its completion.
author: C. Northcote Parkinson

quote: You don't want your personality to eclipse your work because no one would be interested in seeing your work anymore.
author: Amy Landecker

quote: The pay is good and I can walk to work.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: To be a poet is a condition, not a profession.
author: Robert Frost

quote: An economically peaceful and prosperous Sri Lanka is the dream of youth of the nation. My message for the youth is to collectively work for an inclusively developed Sri Lanka.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Big pay and little responsibility are circumstances seldom found together.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: We have a system that increasingly taxes work and subsidizes nonwork.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: As a human being, I'm work in process.
author: John Lydon

quote: Honor lies in honest toil.
author: Grover Cleveland

quote: I think there are many things that we can do today to make it a better work environment that is more supportive and encouraging of diversity.
author: Aileen Lee

quote: Without work, all life goes rotten. But when work is soulless, life stifles and dies.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Without labor nothing prospers.
author: Sophocles

quote: Work is much more fun than fun.
author: Noel Coward

quote: There are one hundred men seeking security to one able man who is willing to risk his fortune.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Going to work for a large company is like getting on a train. Are you going sixty miles an hour or is the train going sixty miles an hour and you're just sitting still?
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: The only way to enjoy anything in this life is to earn it first.
author: Ginger Rogers

quote: America believes in education: the average professor earns more money in a year than a professional athlete earns in a whole week.
author: Evan Esar

quote: The greatest teacher I know is the job itself.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: Work isn't to make money; you work to justify life.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: It is only when I am doing my work that I feel truly alive.
author: Federico Fellini

quote: This industry is all about work, and just because Sundance exposed me to the world, it is my job to stay deserving in that world. The work never ends; the hustle just get harder, and you get stronger!
author: Gina Rodriguez

quote: The Open Skies issue is something that's ongoing and we understand that there are issues in Australia that need to be sorted out. It's something that I think over time there's an opportunity for us and we'll work on that in a progressive way.
author: Jenny Shipley

quote: There's a lot of bitterness, there's a lot of anger out there. We all have to work hard to heal those wounds.
author: Allen Boyd

quote: The idea of having a steady job is appealing.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Careers, like rockets, don't always take off on time. The trick is to always keep the engine running.
author: Gary Sinise

quote: It's easier to change what you do than people think it is. If you don't change, your field changes around you.
author: Walter Gilbert

quote: The harder you work... and visualize something, the luckier you get.
author: Seal

quote: Labor gives birth to ideas.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: I thought the attractions of being an astronaut were actually, not so much the Moon, but flying in a completely new medium.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: Inspiration comes of working every day.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Management must manage!
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: If you don't want to work you have to work to earn enough money so that you won't have to work.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: Teaching was the hardest work I had ever done, and it remains the hardest work I have done to date.
author: Ann Richards

quote: My husband changed jobs so fast that I simply never knew what business he was in.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: I have found in work that you only get back what you put into it, but it does come back gift-wrapped.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: And to get real work experience, you need a job, and most jobs will require you to have had either real work experience or a graduate degree.
author: Donald Norman

quote: Be open to the amazing changes which are occurring in the field that interest you.
author: Leigh Steinberg

quote: I always got my work done before playing.
author: Edwin Moses

quote: As an actor, to have achieved financial stability is amazing. But I always have this weird fear that I'm not going to get any more work; it's about not having enough money.
author: Paul Giamatti

quote: You know, I think the greatest gift in the world is a good employee, you know, or people who can do your work for you and do it well the way you'd like to have it done. And I've always been able to surround myself with really good people.
author: Kenny Rogers

quote: Put off thy cares with thy clothes; so shall thy rest strengthen thy labor, and so thy labor sweeten thy rest.
author: Francis Quarles

quote: Most people treat the office manual the way they treat a software manual. They never look at it.
author: James Levine

quote: The economy in the Valley will need to grow if students want to come back and work with their specialized degrees. We need to develop more to create more opportunities.
author: Frank Murphy

quote: I have always argued that change becomes stressful and overwhelming only when you've lost any sense of the constancy of your life. You need firm ground to stand on. From there, you can deal with that change.
author: Richard Nelson Bolles

quote: Because I have work to care about, it is possible that I may be less difficult to get along with than other women when the double chins start to form.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: I work to stay alive.
author: Bette Davis

quote: Blessed is he who has found his work; let him ask no other blessedness.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Work alone is noble.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: For the last several years and culminating in six months in orbit next year, I've been training for my third space flight. This one is almost in a category completely different than the previous two, specifically to live in on the space station for six months, to command a space ship and to fly a new rocket ship.
author: Chris Hadfield

quote: And if small businesspeople say they made it on their own, all they are saying is that nobody else worked seven days a week in their place. Nobody showed up in their place to open the door at five in the morning. Nobody did their thinking, and worrying, and sweating for them.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: Dreaming in public is an important part of our job description, as science writers, but there are bad dreams as well as good dreams. We're dreamers, you see, but we're also realists, of a sort.
author: William Gibson

quote: Concentrate on your job and you will forget your other troubles.
author: William Feather

quote: If Botticelli were alive today he'd be working for Vogue.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: You're blessed if you have the strength to work.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: The will to work of everyone in the country is the best guarantee of national survival.
author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: I mean I don't really think about it. You know, do you know what I often say to myself? I think you're very lucky in life if you know what you want to do.
author: Andrew Lloyd Webber

quote: No person who is enthusiastic about his work has anything to fear from life.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: There is no disgrace in working. There was no silver spoon around at the time I was born.
author: Anna Held

quote: Your chances of success are directly proportional to the degree of pleasure you desire from what you do. If you are in a job you hate, face the fact squarely and get out.
author: Michael Korda

quote: If you put all your strength and faith and vigor into a job and try to do the best you can, the money will come.
author: Lawrence Welk

quote: On any given day, my father wasn't likely to return from work before I was asleep for the night. I saw that a man's work was important, that he must pursue it tirelessly, and that it might require certain sacrifices, like being away from the warmth and comfort of home.
author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quote: I work 338 days a year, 16 hours a day.
author: Dave Pelzer

quote: Anyone who can walk to the welfare office can walk to work.
author: Al Capp

quote: I'm working myself to death.
author: Alan Ladd

quote: Work is a prayer. And I start off every morning dedicating it to our Creator.
author: Joseph Murray

quote: Two months after I got out of test pilot school, I saw an advert that said NASA was recruiting more astronauts. The best job you could have as a test pilot was being an astronaut, so I volunteered.
author: Charles Duke

quote: Married couples who work together to build and maintain a business assume broad responsibilities. Not only is their work important to our local and national economies, but their success is central to the well-being of their families.
author: Melissa Bean

quote: There's something to be said in favor of working in isolation in the real world.
author: A. R. Ammons

quote: I can't imagine anything more worthwhile than doing what I most love. And they pay me for it.
author: Edgar Winter

quote: After two weeks of working on a project, you know whether it will work or not.
author: Bill Budge

quote: It can be liberating to get fired because you realize the world doesn't end. There's other ways to make money, better jobs.
author: Ron Livingston

quote: Let us realize that: the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
author: David O. McKay

quote: Every man loves what he is good at.
author: Thomas Shadwell

quote: I met an American woman and got married so I had to get a job.
author: Walter Wager

quote: There is a vast world of work out there in this country, where at least 111 million people are employed in this country alone - many of whom are bored out of their minds. All day long.
author: Richard Nelson Bolles
